HeadComp.title: AiSensy vs MSG91 | Compare Communication APIs & Messaging Platforms
HeadComp.description: Compare AiSensy and MSG91 to find the right communication platform for your business. Explore differences in pricing, features, ease of integration, and support to make an informed decision.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs AiSensy
CompareBannerComp.subheading: MSG91 and AiSensy are powerful platforms for WhatsApp and customer engagement. While MSG91 offers a broader omnichannel and customizable messaging suite, AiSensy focuses on WhatsApp-first automation with a no-code interface, catering to businesses seeking quick, WhatsApp-centric solutions.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91, on the other hand, is a robust omnichannel communication platform offering WhatsApp, SMS, Email, and RCS with advanced automation capabilities. It supports AI-driven journey creation, dynamic segmentation, and enterprise-grade reliability. With flexible customization, localized pricing, and premium support, MSG91 is ideal for growing businesses seeking scalability beyond just WhatsApp.

content.name: AiSensy
content.des: AiSensy is a WhatsApp-focused platform tailored for businesses aiming to quickly launch chatbots, run campaigns, and engage users through no-code automation. It offers features like Flow Builder, catalog integration, and Meta Ads connectivity—ideal for SMEs looking for a simple, WhatsApp-only solution.

features.pricing: Costlier, Added margin on Meta pricing
features.multi_agent_support: AiSensy offers unlimited agent logins with all its paid plans,
features.omnichannel_communication: AiSensy primarily focuses on WhatsApp-based communication
features.ai_chatbot_integration: No direct ChatGPT integration; only via third-party tools.
features.unlimited_bot_creation: Only 5 flows are for free—additional flows require pay-as-you-go.
features.whatsapp_carousels: supports creating and sending WhatsApp carousel templates.
features.whatsapp_catalogs: Built-in catalog via Facebook;setup with Flow Builder only.
features.customer_journey_creation: Customer journeys can be created only via the WhatsApp channel using the Flow Builder.
features.client_segmentation: Smart segmentation is available with 5 custom attributes; adding more requires pay-as-you-go.
features.integration_and_plugins: Integrates with Shopify, WooCommerce, CleverTap, CRMs, and automation tools.
features.otp_widget: Doesn't offer a standalone OTP widget.
features.unified_platform: One WhatsApp-focused dashboard for segmentation, ad integration, and chatbot automation.
features.customer_support_quality: Monday to Saturday from 10 AM to 7 PM
features.meta_ads_trackings_conversion: Provides real-time analytics for messages, campaigns, agent activity, and ad performance.

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
